xmp_property.name: Advisory
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmp/Advisory_description=An unordered array specifying properties that were edited outside the authoring application. Each item should contain a single namespace and XPath separated by one ASCII space (U+0020).
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmp/Advisory_label=Advisory

xmp_property.name: BaseURL
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmp/BaseURL_description=The base URL for relative URLs in the document content. If this document contains Internet links, and those links are relative, they are relative to this base URL. This property provides a standard way for embedded relative URLs to be interpreted by tools. Web authoring tools should set the value based on their notion of where URLs will be interpreted.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmp/BaseURL_label=Base URL

xmp_property.name: CreateDate
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmp/CreateDate_description=The date and time the resource was originally created.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmp/CreateDate_label=Creation Date

xmp_property.name: CreatorTool
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmp/CreatorTool_description=The name of the tool used to create the resource.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmp/CreatorTool_label=Creator Tool

xmp_property.name: Identifier
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmp/Identifier_description=An unordered array of text strings that unambiguously identify the resource within a given context. An array item may be qualified with xmpidq:Scheme to denote the formal identification system to which that identifier conforms. NOTE: The dc:identifier property is not used because it lacks a defined scheme qualifier and has been defined in the XMP Specification as a simple (single-valued) property.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmp/Identifier_label=Identifier

xmp_property.name: MetadataDate
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmp/MetadataDate_description=The date and time that any metadata for this resource was last changed. It should be the same as or more recent than xmp:ModifyDate.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmp/MetadataDate_label=Metadata Date

xmp_property.name: ModifyDate
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmp/ModifyDate_description=The date and time the resource was last modified. NOTE: The value of this property is not necessarily the same as the file^}s system modification date because it is set before the file is saved.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmp/ModifyDate_label=Modification Date

xmp_property.name: Rating
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmp/Rating_description=The rating property allows the user to assign a fixed value (often ^[stars^] to their assets. The range of values is from 0.0 to 5.0. The value can also be -1.0 to represent a ^[reject^] rating. This means an asset should not be deleted, but not considered in further processing.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmp/Rating_label=Rating
